page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: The housing in this area fall into three main{types,privately owned, {rented from local authority, and {rented property attached to estates {and farms. The only area to contain council housing is at Bewley Common where there are ten. The remaining properties here are privately owned and some cottages are built alongside the course of the derelict{Wilts and {Berks canal}and so appear off the beaten track where once they were on a main thoroughfare (1905). On the{Lackham Estate}are various bulidings occupied by students and staff. Larger properties sometimes open to the public are{Bewley Court,}and {Bowden Park.Pewsham house}is now flats. There are weekend cottages also.
